name: Fiona Kouyoumdjian
title: Associate Professor, Family Medicine
overview: I am a Family Physician, Public Health and Preventive Medicine Physician, and Epidemiologist. I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Family Medicine, and I am also affiliated with the Department of Health Research Methods, Evidence, and Impact and with ICES.I lead a program of research in the Department of Family Medicine focused on the population health status of people who experience incarceration, and I am the Research Director in the Department of Family Medicine.
